name: Green Hollow (GospelsAndGames)
description:
This is Green Hollow. It was made in 1 week for my first ever game jam, Brakey's Game Jam 2023.1. 

You play as a rare creature called Woodwisp. They live within the branches of pine trees and rely on the trees to protect and provide for them. Due to recent disasters, there is only one tree left. You must make it to the last remaining pine cone and cut it loose so that new pines may grow.

I know it's a bit rough around the edges, but I am super proud of this game. This is the first game I have made that I can really call "complete."
